definition: to push/to cut/to refuse/to reject/to decline/to shirk (responsibility)/to put off/to delay/to push forward/to nominate/to elect/massage
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

pinyin: xin1 chan3 pin3 tui1 jie4 hui4

sentences.english: After this presentation, we'll have lunch, which is served in the main conference hall.
sentences.chinese: 推介会之后，我们吃午饭，午饭在大会厅内。

sentences.english: The promotion event brought new business opportunities to Sichuan.
sentences.chinese: 这次推介会为四川省带来了新的商机。

sentences.english: Wang Guangming, deputy secretary-general of the Hunan Provincial People's Government, presides over the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 推介会由湖南省政府副秘书长王光明主持。

sentences.english: Which country's wines presentation do you like to attend?
sentences.chinese: 您最想参加的哪个国家的葡萄酒推介会？

sentences.english: The meeting introduced Zhuhai's tourist products and the tourist investment environment.
sentences.chinese: 推介会介绍了珠海的旅游产品和旅游技资环境。

sentences.english: Organizing news release and new product introduction meeting.
sentences.chinese: 为企业组织新闻发布和新产品推介会。

definition: to display and sell (e.g. at a fair)/sales exhibition
to express in words or writing/to make a speech (esp. short introduction, vote of thanks, afterword, funeral homily etc)/to address (an audience)/same as 致詞|致词

pinyin: xin1 chan3 pin3 tui1 jie4 hui4

definition: to exhibit at or take part in a trade show etc
relative position of exhibition booth/allocated floor space for display stall/allotted exhibit area
road show or promotional tour (for a product etc)
